Verses: 1 nee Dhevaalayaththukkup Pogumpodhu Un Nadaiyaik Kaaththukkol; Moodar Paliyiduvadhupolap Paliyiduvadhaippaarkkilum Sevikodukka Servadhe Nalam. Thaangal Seygiradhu Theemaiyendru Ariyaadhirukkiraargal.

2 dhevasamugaththil Nee Thunigaramaai Un Vaayinaal Pesaamalum, Manampadhari Oru Vaarththaiyaiyum Sollaamalum Iru; Dhevan Vaanaththilirukkiraar; Nee Boomiyilirukkiraai, Aadhalaal Un Vaarththaigal Surukkamaayiruppadhaaga.
3 thollaiyin Thiratchiyinaal Soppanam Pirakkiradhupola, Vaarththaigalin Thiratchiyinaal Moodanudaiya Saththam Pirakkum.
4 nee Dhevanukku Oru Poruththanaipannikkondaal, Adhai Seluththath Thaamadhiyaadhe; Avar Moodaril Piriyappadugiradhillai, Nee Nerndhukondadhaichchey.
5 nee Nerndhukondadhai Seyyaamarpovadhaippaarkkilum, Nerndhukollaadhiruppadhe Nalam.

6 un Maamsaththaip Paavaththukkullaakka Un Vaaikku Idankodaadhe, Adhu Buththipisaginaal Seydhadhu Endru Thoodhanukkumun Sollaadhe, Dhevan Un Vaarththaigalinaale Kobankondu, Un Kaigalin Kiriyaiyai Azhippaanen?
7 anega Soppanangal Maayaiyaayiruppadhupola, Anega Vaarththaigalum Viyarththamaayirukkum; Aagaiyaal Nee Dhevanukku Bayandhiru.

8 oru Dhesaththil Ezhaigal Odukkappadugiradhaiyum, Nyaayamum Needhiyum Purattappadugiradhaiyum Nee Kaanbaayaanaal, Adhaikkuriththu Aachchariyappadaadhe; Uyarndhavanmel Uyarndhavan Kaavalaaliyaayirukkiraan; Avargalmel Uyarndhavarum Oruvarundu.
9 boomiyil Vilaiyum Palan Yaavarukkumuriyadhu; Raajaavum Vayalin Palanaal Aadharikkappadugiraan.
10 panappiriyan Panaththinaal Thirupthiyadaivadhillai; Selvappiriyan Selvapperukkinaal Thirupthiyadaivadhillai; Idhuvum Maayaiye.
11 porul Peruginaal Adhaith Thingiravargalum Perugugiraargal; Adhai Udaiyavargal Thangal Kangalinaal Adhai Kaanbadheyandri Avargalukkup Prayojanam Enna?
12 velaiseygiravan Konjamaaip Pusiththaalum Adhigamaaip Pusiththaalum Avan Niththirai Inbamaayirukkum; Selvanudaiya Perukko Avanaith Thoongavottaadhu.
13 sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Naan Kanda Veroru Kodiya Theengumundu Adhaavadhu, Aisuvariyamaanadhu Adhai Udaiyavargalukke Kedundaagumpadi Segariththu Vaikkappaduvadhaam.
14 andha Aisuvariyam Vikkinaththaal Azhindhupogiradhu; Avan Oru Puththiranaip Perugiraan, Avan Kaiyil Yaadhondrum Illai.
15 than Thaayin Karppaththilirundhu Nirvaaniyaai Vandhaan; Vandhadhupolave Nirvaaniyaaith Thirumbippovaan. Avan Than Prayaasaththinaal Undaana Palanondraiyum Than Kaiyile Eduththukkondupovadhillai.
16 avan Vandhapragaarame Pogiraan, Idhuvum Kodumaiyaana Theengu; Avan Kaatrukkup Prayaasappattadhinaal Avanukku Laabam Enna?
17 avan Than Naatkalilellaam Irulile Pusiththu, Migavum Saliththu, Noyum Thunbamum Adaigiraan.

18 idho Uyirodirukkumpadi Dhevan Arulichcheydha Naalellaam Manushan Pusiththuk Kudiththu, Sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Thaan Padum Prayaasam Anaiththin Palanaiyum Anubavippadhe Nalamum Uththamumaana Kaariyamendru Naan Kanden, Idhuve Ivan Pangu.

19 dhevan Aisuvariyaththaiyum Sambaththaiyum Evanukkuk Koduththirukkiraaro, Avan Adhile Pusikkavum, Thanpangaip Peravum, Than Prayaasaththile Magizhchchiyaayirukkavum Avanukku Adhigaaram Alippadhu Dhevanudaiya Anukkragam.
20 avanudaiya Irudhayaththile Magizhumpadi Dhevan Avanukku Anukkragampannugirapadiyinaal, Avan Than Jeevanulla Naatkalai Adhigamaai Ninaiyaan.
